basics.name: Brayden Suzuki
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

volunteer.title: HKN Officer/Bridge Correspondent
volunteer.organization: Eta Kappa Nu Delta Omega Chapter
volunteer.summary: Officer in the IEEE-HKN honor society for electrical and computer engineers. In charge of chapter activity reports, planning social & outreach events, and assisting in managing the chapter to foster HKN's mission of technological innovation and excellence.

awards.title: Dean's List Fall 2020 - Spring 2023
awards.summary: The Dean's List recognizes students with a superior academic record. The minimum grade point average being 3.5 for 12 or more credits of academic coursework.
